item.title: Find Fiber On-Net Buildings
item.description:
When choosing a new office space, businesses typically prioritize factors like rent, location, and size. However, they often overlook a crucial aspect: internet connectivity. While utilities like water and electricity are standard, reliable fiber optic internet is not guaranteed. Although bandwidth is becoming increasingly essential, it’s not as universally available as other utilities. Finding an office building with existing fiber optic connections is rare. While many buildings may offer standard telephone lines, these are not suitable for high-speed internet needs...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/find-fiber-on-net-buildings/
